entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
